name: Vodinoy
description:
You wander the cursed lands in search of salvation.                                                                   

The light is your friend, as it will protect you from the ones that have never seen it.      

Find your way out of this place, or let them swallow you.

Slavic mythology themed game where you are in a swamp filled with all sorts of monsters. You carry a lamp that can store lights, which will scare monsters that live in the dephts.

What will you find if you can survive the swamp waters?

SPOILERS AHEAD:

If you want to see all the monsters:

-Leshy follows you all the time, although slowly. Stand still at one place and he will reach you.

-Water tentacles, at the bottom of the swamp, if you get close to them they will attack you, but if you carry a light they will hide as they fear the light.

-Vodinoys, activated after disturbing the spirit trees that move (by getting too close to them), every time there's more of them and the way to scare them is to look at them, so if you stop looking in one direction they will attack you from behind.

TIPS:

-The lights travel slower than you so to catch them in your lantern you need to stand still for a bit.

-The water is full of monsters and you need to carry a lot of light balls which are accumulable in time to cross long distances! Find where you can get a lot of lights!
